website_summaries.verdict: This clock includes lots of customizeable features and has a simple design that is great for kids of all ages.
pros: Choose between seven different light colors (or rotate all the colors) and 10 brightness levels
Sunrise simulation can start 30 minutes before your alarm time to gently wake you
Also has six nature sounds and FM radio
cons: Very young kids might not like the simple color design as much as older kids

customer_reviews.title: Get smart lights instead
customer_reviews.text: The major drawback of this clock is that you have to reprogram the settings (including the time) every time it's unplugged. The built-in sounds are not that pleasant to listen to, which can make waking up jarring. I would suggest going with smart lightbulbs instead, as they can connect to your phone and you would have more fine-grained control and automation.
customer_reviews.author: Ayah Muted

customer_reviews.title: Nice when it works
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this since October of 2017 and I do like the product, but Ive noticed some features no longer work. About 1 year after I put this alarm to use I noticed the sunrise feature could not be adjusted to anything but the 30-minute setting. I also realized recently that the auxiliary battery in case pwr is cut no longer works, trying an unused good battery didnt help. Pwr outages are more of a thing for me now and it kinda screwed up my alarm for work one day...Super fun! Cheap Chinese crap, but its nice when it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle waking
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this alarm clock. I have had it for over a year now. What I love about it the most is the gentle light that turns on 30 or 15 minutes before the actual alarm. The softly increasing volume of the alarm also helps you wake up gently. This alarm helps me wake up better and feel more rested because I'm not hitting the snooze button until the last minute
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hornyack

customer_reviews.title: The alarm is delightful.
customer_reviews.text: This clock delivers on all the features it promised. The gradually increasing sound was very nice. The light is a fun feature and once you get the hang of all the buttons, it is super easy to use. I especially like how simple setting the time and alarm is.
customer_reviews.author: DuiSheng Xie

customer_reviews.title: I don't use this because it is too hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: The controls suck. It's the kind of junk you keep because it could "work" if it wasn't so unpleasant to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not work properly. Very confusing to set up and use. It was unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 6 year olds. They know how to operate the snooze, lights, radio & how to turn the alarm off. The rest, (setting time & programming the radio) should be done by an adult. The lighting is awesome. Can be dim or very bright.
customer_reviews.author: tessd2019

customer_reviews.title: So so sunrise clock
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock is cute for kids. The buttons on the actual screen give me fits and the color options are a little bright but I’m still working through the directions so maybe it’s operator error. There could be more options for the wake up sounds but what’s available will do. Again, this is good for kids but nothing I would purchase for myself or any other adult.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: It’s great 👍
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very cool product. It’s very bright and soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Alt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Quit working less than a year after we bought it. The sunset system doesn't work nor does it keep time. Will be buying a replacement clock for my child.
customer_reviews.author: Zathronos

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our 10 year old granddaughter. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the fun colors and easy to set and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes unbearable high-pitched sound
customer_reviews.text: When plugged in, the clock makes a high pitched sound. It is impossible to sleep next to. The lighting features themselves work fine, but the sound has caused us not to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I love the alarm clock!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for a couple of days. I love it. It helps me wake up and get on a normal sleeping schedule. Feeling very relaxed, this is an awesome way to wake up in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L.

customer_reviews.title: Works good. As described.
customer_reviews.text: Works really good as a night light. My child doesn’t know exactly how to use it yet but she’s already figured out the night light & uses it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Des Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great, just wish it had USB charging port.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Everything works properly
customer_reviews.text: everything works, colors change, you can use it as a night light, but it's still quite bright. Cool clock. When the alarm is connected the lighting gradually rises if you activate that option.the product is great
customer_reviews.author: Josette Dessources

customer_reviews.title: Works great mostly
customer_reviews.text: The light features are great on this but the speakers are absolutely terrible and tinny. Definitely don't get it if you plan to use the radio feature.
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: The only thing i don't like about this alarm is that I can't turn off ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i don't like about this alarm is that I can't turn off the sunrise light lol. I wake up early because of it but otherwise I love this alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice alarm clock that perfect for my girl
customer_reviews.text: Very nice alarm clock that perfect for my girl. There are 7 colors light and 10 level brightness. My daughter loves it so much.The sunrise and sunset modes could make the light getting bright or dim gradually. What a interesting design! 6 natural sounds are very nice. Easy to set time and operate. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: ggghands

product_meta.title: Sunrise Alarm Clock - Joyful Heart Best Wake Up Light with 7 Colors Changing, FM Radio, Touch Control, Snooze Function and Sunrise Simulator Alarm Clock for Bedside, Adults and Kids
product_meta.description: Are you still wake up in the morning after hearing the annoying repetitive buzzing noise from most digital alarm clocks Are you wake up every day and feel your body is not awake yet If you are, just go for it! The JOYFULHEART Wake Up light Alarm Clock is a Best Gift for your It is ideal for anyone who finds it difficult to fall asleep in the night or wake up in the morning. The warm light will be on 30 minutes prior to your wake-up alarm time and Its gradual sunrise eases you awake, gently and naturally. And Sunset function will guide you to natural, restful sleep. YOU WILL GET : √ Warm white wake up light & 7 color changing mood light 7 colored (Warm White, Green, Red, Blue, Purple, Orange, Indigo) mood light create fascinating atmosphere. And warm white wake up light with 10 brightness settings. You could touch '+' or '-' to select. √6 natural sounds & FM radio alarm clock 6 natural sounds such as pure music, birds, forest, waves, beeping and violin, which let you revel in the sounds and smells of the nature. As well as FM radio, you can set your favorite FM radio station. √ Clear & brightness adjustable time display JOYFULHEART alarm clock with clear screen offers a large, crystal clear big orange display, which is easy to read from anywhere in the whole house. FEATURES : - Clear time display in 12H and 24H format; - Warm and color light; - Sunrise simulation wake up light; - Sunset simulation; - Touch mode; - Wake up to natural sounds or FM radio; - FM radio and antenna built in; - Power supply:5V DC; 1 X CR2032 battery; USB cable. PACKAGE : 1 X Wake Up Light Alarm Clock 1 X User Manual 1 X USB Cable 1 X Power Adapter
feature_bullets: ⏰【BEST ALARM CLOCK DESIGN】 - 2018 upguade verison which adapt a more considerate and concise design for both children and the old. You can select the brightness of time displayer panel. Comfortable and neat design will make it perfect to fit in your bedroom décor.

⏰【MOST COLOR & BRIGHTNESS】 - 7 Color Light and 10 Level Brightness. There are 7 colors for your preference.It also can act as bedside lamp with 10 brightness. You can set the color light to auto-converse one by one, or just choose a loved color stand to beam your room.

⏰【AMAZING SUNRISE & SUNSET SIMULATION】 - 30 minutes earlier before your alarm time and gently wake you up from deep sleep to welcome a refreshed day; The sleep Light will gradually dim and shuts of finally when you set the sunset mode.

⏰【GREAT NATURAL SOUNDS & FM RADIO】 - 6 natural sounds, Ocean wave, nature sounds, crickets, barnyard sounds, bubbling brook and birds singing which can let you feel the beauty of the nature. And FM Radio, let you wake up at your favorite voice.
⏰【YOU WILL GET】 - 1* Wake Up Light, 1* USB Cable, 1* 5V/1A Adapter & 1 Year Warranty
